product_name: Clean Bottle The Square Stainless-Steel Water Bottle
long_description: The Square stainless-steel water bottle from Clean Bottle unscrews from both ends for easy cleaning and drying. Plus, it just looks cool. Features a leak-proof, screw-off bottom for easy access to the whole bottle for cleaning; top and bottom open and close quickly and easily. Stainless-steel construction won't affect the taste of your water. Modern square shape keeps the bottle from rolling away if it tips over; designed to fit in most cup holders. Carry the Clean Bottle The Square stainless-steel water bottle via the built-in handle, or connect it to a pack with a small carabiner (sold separately).
short_description: The Square stainless-steel water bottle from Clean Bottle unscrews from both ends for easy cleaning and drying. Plus, it just looks cool.
